DOC.brief_title: Low -vs- High-Frequency Repetitive TMS Right Dorsolateral Prefrontal Cortex PTSD
DOC.detailed_description: The study carry within Overcoming Adversity Stress Injury Support ( OASIS ) program administer Naval Medical Center San Diego ( NMSD ) . OASIS residential treatment program develop active duty service member diagnose combat relate PTSD . OASIS 9 week program cohort 10 patient undergo variety therapeutic activity focus cognitive processing therapy ( CPT ) combat trauma conduct group individual format . Subjects qualify assign block randomization one four arm : 1 . 1 Hz rTMS right dorsolateral prefrontal cortex 2 . 10 Hz rTMS right dorsolateral prefrontal cortex 3 . Sham rTMS right dorsolateral prefrontal cortex 4 . OASIS treatment usual Treatment administer 10 daily session , conduct weekday , 2 consecutive week . .
